profile:
City roofing and aluminum co. has been in business since 1994, over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the roofing industry.
Our roofing department offers residential and commercial services including re-roofing; new roof construction and retro-fitting, we install a wide range of materials such as asphalt shingles, metal roofing, composite roof and cedar wood shakes.
Our aluminum department offers complete aluminum product.s and sheet metal work, our crews utilizes state of art tools and equipment to install aluminum soffit, fascia, seamless eavestrough and rainware accessories.
Whatâ€™s more, in addition to providing re-roofing services and new construction work, we also offer roofing repair services, on-going maintenance service, and roofing inspection consultations.  These services are designed to extend the life of your roof by identifying and fixing the minor problems before they become major issues.
name: City Roofing & Aluminum Co.

profile:
Professional skylight installations, repairs, and replacements in Toronto and GTA is what Andy Skylight does.
    Do you live in the Greater Toronto Area and are considering installing a  skylight? Repairing or replacing an old one? If so,you have come to the right place! 
    Andy' Skylights have been in the professional skylight business for 20 years, 7 of which were spent in Toronto learning more about skylights and gaining experience. Only Andy Skylights know how to repair, install, or replace skylights and everything related to them like the back of our hand. So when it comes to skylights, you can rely on us without a doubt! Call Andy' Skylights for an excellent, neat, professional skylight installation or repair.

profile:
Skylights are the go-to solution of bringing in natural daylight in to your home. You will experience the flood of warmth and nature that can be enjoyed from the comforts of your home. With 3 generations of skylight manufacturing experience, Artistic Skylight Domes is a proud Canadian manufacturer of a complete selection of high performance, quality acrylic and insulated glass skylights, designed for any residential, commercial, and industrial application. With our wide range of custom colours, shapes, and sizes and standard options we will always have the right option for your home. 


As part of our ongoing commitment to our customers we strive to provide quality products, customer service and satisfaction second to none. To maintain our high levels of quality control, our management team uses a hands on approach as well as using state of the art machinery for all our in house manufacturing.


Our skylights are ENERGY STAR Rated for all Zones (1, 2, & 3). We are one of the few in Canada that have obtained the prestigious Energy Star branding for high energy-efficiency for our products. And because Energy Star rating is the highest possible in Canada this means you are buying the highest-grade skylight you could possibly buy. The benefits included with high performing products results in lower amounts of energy required to cool and heat your home in the winter and summer months reducing monthly bills. For more information on Energy Star visit our website.


Complete Skylight Installations: are also offered for all product lines. Not only do we manufacture your skylight to exactly how you envisioned it, but direct from our production facility to your roof, our installers are trained and certified to work specifically with the product that we manufacture. As an added piece-of-mind full installation options are also offered with options including; dry walling, ceiling/roof framing, skylight shaft construction, drywall priming/paint preparation, and much more. 


Emergency Services: for responding to leaking or cracked skylights that may cause damage to your home's interior. Get us on site to assess the damage and present the best possible option for quick and easy repairs to your home.


Come to our showroom and see what we have to offer at 255 Regina Rd, Vaughan, Ontario !
